description:
Meanwhile, Back At The Ranch
The video picks back up with me sitting around the bar at my place with Zack and Joey and shooting the shit. The doorbell soon rings and in comes Zane and his newly recruited SGT. The guys get acquainted and the hot kissing, sucking, ass eating fest begins.

While Zack and Zane take a quick shower, Adam and Joey get to know each other better. They trade blow jobs on the futon until the other guys get out of the shower. When all four guys are together again all heck breaks loose and there's so much sucking and licking going on that it's hard to keep track of who's doing who.

The troops line up march out to the living room for more carnal pleasures. They line up in perfect formation for a little segment I call 'The Daisy Chain of Command' with more ass eating action than anyone should be exposed to. The 4 man action lasts for about an hour and 15 minutes, during which time everyone gets off and everyone is just plain wore out.
title: Adam Joey, Zack & Zane
